00007 #pragma once
00008 #include <cstring>
00009 #include <vector>
00010 #include <algorithm>
00011 #include "lsf/basic/macro.hpp"
00012 #include "lsf/basic/scope_exit.hpp"
00013 
00014 namespace lsf {
00015 namespace algorithm {
00016 
00017 namespace detail {
00018 
00019 bool next_combination(std::vector<int8_t> & vec, size_t count) {
00020     for (size_t i = 0; i < count - 1; ++i) {
00021         if (vec[i] == 1 && vec[i + 1] == 0) {
00022             // swap
00023             std::swap(vec[i], vec[i + 1]);
00024 
00025             // move all 1 to the left
00026             std::sort(vec.begin(), vec.begin() + i, std::greater<int8_t>());
00027 
00028             return true;
00029         }
00030     }
00031 
00032     return false;
00033 }
00034 
00035 }  // end of namespace detail
00036 
00037 template <typename IterType, typename FuncType>
00038 bool for_combination(IterType begin, IterType end, size_t cmb_count, FuncType func) {
00039     std::vector<IterType> combination;
00040     size_t count = end - begin;
00041 
00042     // check input
00043     if (count < cmb_count) return false;
00044 
00045     // alloc and init array
00046     std::vector<int8_t> vec;
00047     vec.reserve(count);
00048     vec.insert(vec.end(), cmb_count, 1);
00049     vec.insert(vec.end(), count - cmb_count, 0);
00050 
00051     // traverse all combination
00052     do {
00053         combination.clear();
00054 
00055         size_t i = 0;
00056         IterType iter = begin;
00057         while (i < count) {
00058             if (vec[i]) combination.push_back(iter);
00059             ++iter;
00060             ++i;
00061         }
00062 
00063         func(combination);
00064     } while (detail::next_combination(vec, count));
00065 
00066     return true;
00067 }
00068 
00069 }  // end of namespace algorithm
00070 }  // end of namespace lsf
